location: MaMeeFarm Vegetable Bed (adjacent to Duck House), Thailand
title: wet_soil_condition_adjacent_to_duck_house
summary: Observation of visibly wet soil surface in a vegetable bed adjacent to the duck house.
description: Image documents wet soil conditions in a vegetable planting area located near the duck house. The observation was recorded in the same time window and spatial zone as the temperature and humidity measurement documented in Data Unit 00206.

environmental_context.relation_to_structure: former duck house area repurposed for vegetable cultivation

context_notes: Same time window as humidity measurement
Same spatial zone as duck house environment
Supports correlation between high humidity and soil moisture
Observation only, no irrigation action recorded

external_reference.note: Image shows wet soil surface in a vegetable bed.
